Html:
Hi,

  I want to get a cetain column , but after some hard search , I didn't find any way.

  I mean something like this:

Column clm=worksheet.Columns[0];

 

  I saw DimonNew's post of insert a new column:

Columns cols = new Columns( new Column() { Min = 7, Max = 7, CustomWidth = true, Width = 20} );

worksheetPart.Worksheet.InsertBefore<Columns>(cols, worksheetPart.Worksheet.GetFirstChild<SheetData>());

 

But is there any way of get the column instead of insert?

Thanks.

 

Moosdau
